Params: {1: '1', 3: 'After blowing up a few more walls, Karenina runs into another Construct underground...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory70.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Why are you here...?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'You almost blew me up!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'They sent you here for a mission! Not total annihilation!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "It's just a bit of gunpowder... Stop being such a baby.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Well, we're here already, so let's exchange some information. What have you found?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I've found some samples that resemble an antigen to the Punishing Virus.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: '(Takes out a handful of gold dust) So have I...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '...Hand it over. Let me run some tests.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory70.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: '...Both of them are fundamentally the same kind of nanotechnology.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'But it is very unstable in suppressing the virus...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "You're right! It's super unstable!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "It suppresses the virus, and then it weakens the Corrupted, doesn't it?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "But it doesn't take long for the Corrupted to get up again. Stranger still, some of them would return to their original power level...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Have you fought the Corrupted here? In the Golden Vortex?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Let me tell you the whole story...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'From what you said, this antigen is highly unstable. We must report this to Babylonia...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "If you're coming with me, then you better help out! Don't let me see you slacking!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Right as she finishes speaking, she blows up another wall...'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: '...Wait for me!', 4: '2'}
